title: VLSI & Adv Digital Dsgn
description: Advanced digital design issues in the context of VLSI systems. Introduction to a design methodolgy that encompasses the range from architectural models to circuit simulation. Credit not awarded for ECE 3150 and ECE 3060.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 2031 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and ECE 2040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
